cast.name: 马丁·康普斯顿 Martin Compston

introduction: Embark on an epic Scandinavian adventure in this action-packed travelogue fronted by Line of Duty star Martin Compston and his childhood pal Phil MacHugh.Martin and Phil are searching for all that it means to be from the 'North' and lifting the lid on what else we can learn from the most Northern of their Scandinavian siblings, Norway. Starting their road trip in Shetland, the pair travel the length of Norway through vibrant cities, snowy peaks and stunning fjords. From the capital city of Oslo to the ancient Viking Valley, the pair sample local herring, try their luck at roller skiing and get up close to arctic animals.S1 E1 OsloS1 E2 Bergen & the South WestS1 E3 From Bergen to VossS1 E4 Central NorwayS1 E5 TrondheimS1 E6 The Arctic Circle
